成都聚实节能科技有限公司

invention-title: PSA (Pressure Swing Adsorption) pressure equalizing method capable of recovering energy and keeping molar fraction gradient
能量回收并保持摩尔分率梯度的PSA均压方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to a PSA pressure equalizing method capable of recovering energy and keeping a molar fraction gradient. A piston type energy recovery device provided with an upper cylinder, a lower cylinder, a small grid space, a power piston, a pressure-bearing cylinder body, a mechanical transmission mechanism and a generator is connected into a pressure-equalizing airflow pipeline and a reverse deflation airflow pipeline; in the gas inlet and outlet process of an upper cylinder and a lower cylinder, a power piston, a mechanical transmission mechanism and a generator are driven to convert the energy into electric energy; the isentropic expansion work of the pressure-equalizing air flow reduces the temperature of the air flow, thereby powerfully reducing the temperature of the PSA process and greatly increasing the strong adsorption phase capacity of a bed layer; due to the arrangement of the small lattice spaces, the consistency of the molar fraction gradient of the pressure-equalizing airflow in the depressurization bed and the pressurization bed is effectively ensured, so that the PSA separation factor and the separation efficiency are greatly improved; the method is especially suitable for decarburization of shift gas in large-scale coal chemical industry, recovery of combustible components from raw gas, recovery of methane from coal bed gas with medium and low calorific values, separation of methane and hydrogen in a coal hydrogenation methanation process and the like.

能量回收并保持摩尔分率梯度的PSA均压方法。将设有上缸、下缸、小格空间、动力活塞、承压缸体、机械传动机构、发电机的活塞式能量回收装置连接于均压气流和逆放气流管道中；使吸附塔间的气体泄放能量，在上缸、下缸的进出气过程中，驱动动力活塞、机械传动机构、发电机转化为电能；均压气流的等熵膨胀作功，使气流温度降低，有力降低PSA工艺温度，大幅增加床层强吸附相容量；小格空间的设置，有效确保了均压气流的摩尔分率梯度在降压床和升压床中的一致性，从而大幅提高PSA分离因子、分离效率；该方法尤其适用于大型煤化工的变换气脱碳、荒煤气回收可燃组分、中低热值煤层气回收甲烷、煤加氢甲烷化工艺中的甲烷氢气分离等。
